name: Tim Vs The Infinite Horde
description:
My Submission For The 2020 CCC Game Jam! 

A zombie game with an endless, procedurally generated world.  Explore a abandoned world that had very few different house designs. Collect guns and try to survive as long as you can. But look out for the zombified version of yourself, who is much faster and more powerful then the other zombies because you are a mega-chad. (Yes this is how I implemented the theme) This game was made in just one week, and there will be a video made over it's creation on my channel.

(I forgot to put the controls in the game, so here they are)

WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

E - Pickup Gun

F - Drop Gun

Youtube:
